section.7: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Prostration while reciting the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) prostrated himself at night when reciting the Qur'an. He said repeatedly: My face prostrates itself to Him Who created it and brought forth its hearing and seeing by His might and power
